item.title: Bootlegging is Not (Always) a Crime
item.description: Bootleg â‰ Fake. Tak semua pembajakan itu haram hukumnya. Pada kasus tertentu, “pembajakan” bisa berubah menjadi bentuk apresiasi.

item.title: woodcabin., Gegedug Midwest-Emo Lokal yang Terlupakan
item.description: Jauh sebelum eleventwelfth muncul dan populer, Indonesia sebenarnya sudah memiliki band yang membawakan musik midwest-emo. Mereka adalah woodcabin.

item.title: Lika-Liku Pemberian Nilai pada Sebuah Rilisan Musik
item.description: Serius saya penasaran, seberapa penting atau efektifnya sih untuk menggunakan sistem angka penilaian pada sebuah review rilisan?

About

With over 5 years of experience in independent music media, such as ROI! Radio, Rich Music Online, Consumed Magazine, and Living Society Media, Sendhi has crafted compelling essays and written engaging reviews. His passion lies in uncovering emerging talent from the sidestream scenes, where he developed a knack for storytelling and a keen eye for detail.

Aside from writing, he also likes conducting thought-provoking interviews, drawing out candid insights from musicians and industry insiders, which allows him to craft authentic narratives that resonate with readers.
